item.description:
This is our annual New Year's Eve dance party and is a blast! Admission is $15.00,which includes a free hot buffet (while it lasts) and free drink set-ups (cups & ice and refrigeration if needed). Bring whatever you want, liquor & party favors, etc. Join us and welcome the new year! Who knows you may meet that special person and start the new year right. The dance ends at 1 AM.

At Daniels Hall there is no need to throw money away on expensive drinks and tips, just bring your own liquor, we give free cups & ice and there is refrigeration available for customers.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess where the meetup tables are located.

group.name: Find someone new this Friday! Ages 30 to 60.

item.name: New Year's Eve Dance
